mapper.select: SELECT INV_NO AS INVOICE_NO, NET_AMT AS EXCHANGE_FEE, VAT_RATE AS VAT_RATE, AMT AS VAT_AFTER_FEE, CNTR_NO AS CONTAINER_NO, SZTP2 AS SZTP FROM DNP_UAT.TB_INVOICE_UNIT WHERE INV_NO = #{invoiceNo}
SELECT INV_NO AS INVOICE_NO, FROM DNP_UAT.TB_INVOICE_UNIT WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND INV_NO NOT LIKE 'TEMP%' GROUP BY INV_NO
